price: Sila waan uumu irraa ilmaan dubaraa (ofiif) taasifatee, isin immoo ilmaan dhiiraatiin isin filee?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
